夏代.definition: Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC

夏利.definition: Xiali, car brand by Tianjin FAW Xiali Motor Company

夏商周.definition: Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties

夏士蓮.definition: Hazeline, Unilever range of skin care products

夏奧會.definition: the Summer Olympic Games; the Summer Olympics

夏威夷火山國家公園.pinyin: Xia4 wei1 yi2 Huo3 shan1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

夏娃.definition: Eve, the first woman (transcription used in Protestant versions of the Bible) (from Hebrew Ḥawwāh, probably via Cantonese 夏娃 {Haa6waa1})

夏州.definition: old place name (up to Tang), in Hengshan county 橫山縣|横山县, Yulin, Shaanxi

夏敬渠.definition: Xia Jingqu (1705-1787), Qing novelist, author of monumental novel 野叟曝言[Ye3 sou3 Pu4 yan2] Humble Words of a Rustic Elder

夏正民.definition: Justice Michael Hartmann (1944-), Hong Kong High Court judge

夏河.definition: Xiahe County in Gannan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet

夏河縣.definition: Xiahe County in Gannan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet

夏洛克.definition: Shylock (in Shakespeare's Merchant of Venice); Sherlock (name)

夏洛特·勃良特.pinyin: Xia4 luo4 te4 · Bo2 liang2 te4
夏洛特·勃良特.definition: Charlotte Brontë (1816-1855), English novelist, eldest of three Brontë sisters, author of Jane Eyre 簡·愛|简·爱[Jian3 · Ai4]

夏洛特敦.definition: Charlottetown, capital of Prince Edward Island, Canada

夏洛特阿馬利亞.pinyin: Xia4 luo4 te4 A1 ma3 li4 ya4
夏洛特阿馬利亞.definition: Charlotte Amalie, capital of the United States Virgin Islands (USVI)

夏津.definition: Xiajin county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

夏津縣.definition: Xiajin county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

夏王朝.definition: Xia dynasty, unconfirmed but placed at c. 2070-c. 1600 BC

夏目漱石.definition: Natsume Sōseki (1867-1916), one of the first modern Japanese novelists

夏縣.definition: Xia county in Yuncheng 運城|运城[Yun4 cheng2], Shanxi

夏至.definition: Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July

夏蟲不可以語冰.pinyin: xia4 chong2 bu4 ke3 yi3 yu3 bing1
夏蟲不可以語冰.definition: a summer insect cannot discuss ice (idiom)

夏衍.definition: Xia Yan (1900-1995), Chinese writer, playwright, socialist critic and movie pioneer

夏邑.definition: Xiayi county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

夏邑縣.definition: Xiayi county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

夏黃公.definition: Xia Huanggong also known as Huang Shigong 黃石公|黄石公[Huang2 Shi2 gong1] (dates of birth and death uncertain), Daoist hermit of the Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin2 dai4] and purported author of “Three Strategies of Huang Shigong” 黃石公三略|黄石公三略[Huang2 Shi2 gong1 San1 lu:e4], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
